column3:
Managingway needs someone to retrieve a machine on the run.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Search for the prototype supporter near Heimdall's Last Sight.
Deliver the prototype supporter to Managingway.
There's been an emergency call from Inventingway! One of his supporters under development has taken off without warning.
There's been an emergency call from Inventingway! Another one of his supporters has taken off without warning.
We tracked the machine as far as Heimdall's Last Sight, where deadly Allagan weapons are known to prowl.
As much as I dislike delegating dangerous tasks, we need you to find and retrieve the supporter. Please hurry...and be careful!
The supporter has ceased to function. Managingway will be eager to have it back.
Ah, you're back, and none the worse for the wear, thank goodness. You were able to retrieve our runaway supporter, I hope?
We're in your debt! Lest you wonder, this machine was designed to serve as our playmate.
In taking off as it did, it appears to have mistakenly identified the Allagan weapons as friends.
We're in your debt─again. It appears the machine still mistakenly identifies the Allagan weapons as friends...

We all need dreams, and it's a fine thing that Inventingway is dedicated to realizing his. I just wish he didn't create work for others in the process. It rather defeats the purpose of coming up with inventions to make our lives easier.
